Package src

Class DrawableShape

java.lang.Object
src.DrawableShape
public class DrawableShape extends Object
Represents a drawable shape on the canvas. Contains the shape's geometry, colors, stroke width, and selection state.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Color
    fillColor
    The fill color of the shape.
    boolean
    filled
    Whether the shape is filled (true) or only outlined (false).
    Color
    outlinecolor
    The outline color of the shape.
    boolean
    selected
    Whether the shape is currently selected.
    Shape
    shape
    The geometric shape (e.g., circle, rectangle, or path).
    int
    strokeWidth
    The stroke width (outline thickness) of the shape.
